Add to word list
added to something else in order to improve it or complete it: Teachers often create supplementary materials for their classes. Some workers are eligible for supplemental unemployment benefits.
Add to word list
Add to word list
that is provided, needed, or asked for in addition to something else: Also included will be supplementary liability insurance, often up to $1 million, as protection against claims from any third parties. A supplementary budget may be needed to cover the cost of repairs. He is quoted as saying he would not contribute to what he called an unfair supplementary business tax. We will issue a brief supplemental report when these steps are completed.
